1.「ああ なつかしい気配だ……。| ユービアの心が 織り込まれている……。: Oh, the feeling of home... the heart of Yubia|is woven into the fabric...

2.「だが ユービアの使いの者よ……。| 息子は なぜ来ないのだ？| 何かあったので: But, messenger of Yubia... why has my son not|come? Something must have happened to him...?<yesno><close>

4.「……なるほど。贈り物を作ることは できたが| さいほうギルドの仕事が 忙しく|: I see... You were able to make a gift, but you|were too busy with your work at Sewing Guild|to deliver it here...

5.「……ふっ。父である 私の命日に| 使いをよこすとは あいつも なかなか| 立派: Huh. He's become quite a man to send an errand|on the anniversary of my father's death...

6.「……私は かつて 名のある剣士だったが| ある事情から かような身と成り果て|: I was once a renowned swordsman, but|circumstances have forced me to stay here for|many years now. ...

7.「それ以来 我が息子ユービアは こうして| 毎年 命日に服を届けてくれるのだよ。: Since then, my son Yubia has been bringing me|clothes every year on the anniversary of my|death. That is my comfort.

8.「わざわざ ご苦労だったな 使いの者よ……。| さあ こんな所に 長居するもので:
Thank you for coming all this way,|messenger... but come on, you can't stay in a|place like this for long. Tell my son... thank|
|you.
